text: Tara pichata te'omra sampradayara kaphira netasakale ka’le, ‘amito tomaka ejana amara nicina'i manuha bulihe dekhi acho, lagate ami dekhi acho tomaka kerala se'isakala loke'i anusarana karae yisakala amara majata bahyika drstite'i adhama arau ami amara oparata tomalokara kono sraesthatba dekha poraa na'i, baram ami tomalokaka michaliya buli bharao’
